# hasAttitude

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the controller provides attitude data.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasAttitude: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the controller provides attitude data; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **attitude**: The attitude of the controller.
